sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import FacebookLogin from 'react-facebook-login'; export default class Facebook extends Component { state = { isLoggedIn: false, userID: '', name: '', email: '', picture: '' } componentClicked = () => { console.log("clicked"); } componentFailure = () => { console.log("Failed"); } responseFacebook = response => { console.log(response); this.setState({ isLoggedIn: true, userID: response.userID, name: response.name, email: response.email, picture: response.picture.data.url, }) } render() { let fbContent; let prompt; if(this.state.isLoggedIn) { prompt = (

Welcome to SocialScene!

); fbContent = (

{this.state.name}

 email: {this.state.email}
userID: {this.state.userID}


Recently Watched TV Shows, You Recently Watched TV Shows, Friends Most Popular TV Shows, Everyone
Episode TV Show Ranking
Episode TV Show Ranking Friend
Episode TV Show Ranking
); } else { prompt = (

To get started,
Please Login With Facebook.

) fbContent = ( ); } return
{prompt}{fbContent}
; } }
